title: (x) 'Home Theater Shack' / Need to identify font... - Big Noodle Titling {Paul S}
content:
We are trying to identify our logo font at Home Theater Shack... [http://www.hometheatershack.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20140112235111/http:/www.hometheatershack.com/ "http://www.hometheatershack.com")

I have tried a few online sources, but can not seem to figure it out.

Your help is appreciated.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [hometheatershacklogo2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140112235111/http:/typophile.com/files/hometheatershacklogo2.jpg) | 19.41 KB |
author: Sonnie Parker

comments.content: It reminds me most of [Raleigh Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140112235111/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/grouptype/raleigh-gothic/alternate_cuts.html) - on steroids.
